column4: Ive ust installed the new ubuntu, but i dont have any sound... Its an intel machine which came with visa. in lspci this is listed: 00:1b.0 Audio device: Intel Corporation 82801H (ICH8 Family) HD Audio Controller (rev 03)
go to menu > sys > pref > sounds -- and test the different options specifically ALSA
try this page then its for pulseaudio but quite thorough > http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?p=4928900
